mapper.select: SELECT mb.mem_level as memLevel, mb.real_name as realName, ar.superior as superior, ar.team_num as teamNum, gt.user_id AS account, SUM(gt.real_bet_amount) AS realBetAmount, FROM game_txns gt LEFT JOIN agent_relation ar ON gt.user_id = ar.account INNER JOIN mem_baseinfo mb on gt.user_id = mb.account and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(gt.create_time) < 1 GROUP BY account,memLevel,realName,superior,teamNum

SELECT SUM(gt.real_bet_amount) AS realBetAmount FROM game_txns gt LEFT JOIN agent_relation ar ON gt.user_id = ar.account WHERE ar.superior = #{account} AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(gt.create_time) < 1
